mapper.select: /*[TbbsWikiCtegry.xml][getPbbs5001List01][위키 트리조회 ][TANINE]*/ SELECT 0 AS id /*zTree 노드(자신)*/ , 0 AS pId /*zTree 노드(부모)*/ , '전체' AS name /*zTree 노드이름*/ , 0 AS mnu_dpth /*층계*/ , 'Y' AS us_yn /*사용여부*/ , 'TRUE' AS open /*zTree 펼침여부*/ , 'TRUE' AS isParent /*zTree 폴더여부*/ , 'Y' AS isSaved /*DB저장 여부*/ , 0 AS srt_seq /*정렬순서*/ UNION ALL SELECT MN.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , MN.UP_WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , MN.WIKI_CTEGRY_NM , M.LEV , MN.US_YN , CASE WHEN M.LEV = 3 THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END , CASE WHEN M.LEV = 3 THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END , 'Y' , MN.SRT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT GET_TREE_WIKICTEGRY(WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ) AS WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , @LEVEL AS LEV , WIKI_CTEGRY_NM FROM (SELECT @START_WITH := 0, @ID := @START_WITH, @LEVEL := 0) VARS , TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY WHERE @ID IS NOT NULL ) M JOIN TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY MN ON MN.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ = M.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ
mapper.sql: SELECT MN.wiki_ctegry_seq FROM ( SELECT GET_TREE_WIKICTEGRY(WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ) AS WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , @LEVEL AS LEV FROM ( SELECT @START_WITH := #{id} , @ID := @START_WITH , @LEVEL := 0 ) VARS , TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY WHERE @ID IS NOT NULL ) M JOIN TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY MN ON MN.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ = M.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ
mapper.select: /*[TbbsWikiCtegry.xml][getPbbs5001CtegryCd][위키트리 신규 카테고리CD][TANINE]*/ SELECT ifnull(MAX(wiki_ctegry_seq) + 1, 1) as wiki_ctegry_seq FROM TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY

/*[TbbsWikiCtegry.xml][getPbbs5002List01][위키트리 카테고리/명][TANINE]*/ SELECT C.id , C.pId , C.name , C.open , C.isParent , C.LEV FROM ( SELECT W.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ as id , W.UP_WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ as pId , W.WIKI_CTEGRY_NM as name , W.US_YN , FN.LEV , CASE WHEN FN.LEV = 3 THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END AS open , CASE WHEN FN.LEV = 3 THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END AS isParent , @rownum:=@rownum+1 as SRT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT GET_TREE_WIKICTEGRY(WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ) AS WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , @LEVEL AS LEV , WIKI_CTEGRY_NM FROM (SELECT @START_WITH := 0, @ID := @START_WITH, @LEVEL := 0) VARS , TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY WHERE @ID IS NOT NULL ) FN JOIN TBBS_WIKI_CTEGRY W ON W.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ = FN.WIKI_CTEGRY_SEQ , (select @rownum:=0) r ) C WHERE 1=1 AND C.US_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.SRT_SEQ
